name: Stiftung Deutscher Küstenschutz
goal: foundation for coastal protection against sea level rise, storm events, erosion etc.
interests: Education and training, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: integrated coastal zone management, Klimawandel, Meeresspiegelanstieg, CO2 Reduzierung, Meeresumweltschutz, Küstenschutz
